thread.title: Sandra Brigden
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Sandra Brigden

author: Sandra Brigden
title: Sandra Brigden
text: When the glasses that I ordered were delayed (as a NEW item not yet in stock), I received immediate notification from Otticanet and was kept up-to-date on the progress of my order. The order arrived when they said it would and in excellent condition, packaged to a high standard to ensure the item's safety during the shipping process. I would shop with this retailer again, without hesitation.
